Class Pm2Media

java.lang.Object
  Pm2Media

public class Pm2Media
extends java.lang.Object

Pm2Media is the class configuring the whole pm2media project.

Author:
Johannes Perl

Method Detail

setProperties

public static void setProperties(java.lang.String pmWikiURL,
                                 java.lang.String pmWikiLocal,
                                 java.lang.String pmWikiMainNamespace,
                                 java.lang.String mWikiURL,
                                 java.lang.String mWikiUsername,
                                 java.lang.String mWikiPassword,
                                 java.lang.String mWikiLoginPage,
                                 GUI gui)
Sets the properties needed for the PmWiki to MediaWiki conversion to be able to convert articles into MediaWiki syntax and post them into a MediaWiki.

Parameters:
pmWikiURL - the URL to PmWiki
pmWikiLocal - the local path to PmWiki
pmWikiMainNamespace - the main namespace of PmWiki who should be converted to main namespace of MediaWiki
mWikiURL - the URL to MediaWiki
mWikiUsername - the username of MediaWiki user who should post the converted articles
mWikiPassword - the password of the user
mWikiLoginPage - the Name of the MediaWiki login page (eg. Special:Userlogin for English MediaWiki, Spezial:Anmelden for German MediaWiki)
gui - the GUI of the converter

convert

public static void convert()
handling whole convertion process
